tool_description: Fast QR is a powerful API that lets you generate QR codes quickly and easily. With just a few lines of code, you can create custom QR codes that link to your website, social media pages, products, and more. Whether you're a marketer, business owner, or developer, Fast QR makes it easy to add QR code functionality to your app or website. Our API is fast, reliable, and easy to use, so you can generate QR codes on the fly and get your message out to customers in seconds. Try Fast QR today and se...
title: Fast Qr

api_list.name: QR Code Image
api_list.description: Generates the qr-code image of given url
